views.createSql:
CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT mediastore_audio.*
FROM mediastore_audio
    LEFT JOIN blacklist ON mediastore_audio.directory = blacklist.directory --remove blacklisted
WHERE blacklist.directory IS NULL AND isPodcast = false
ORDER BY lower(title) COLLATE UNICODE ASC

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT songs_view.*
FROM songs_view LEFT JOIN sort ON TRUE
WHERE sort.tableName = 'songs'
ORDER BY
-- artist, then title
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'artist' AND artist = '<unknown>' THEN -1 END,
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'artist' AND sort.direction = 'asc' THEN lower(artist) COLLATE UNICODE END ASC,
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'artist' AND sort.direction = 'desc' THEN lower(artist) COLLATE UNICODE END DESC,
-- album, then title
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'album' AND album = '<unknown>' THEN -1 END,
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'album' AND sort.direction = 'asc' THEN lower(album) COLLATE UNICODE END ASC,
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'album' AND sort.direction = 'desc' THEN lower(album) COLLATE UNICODE END DESC,
-- duration, then title
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'duration' AND sort.direction = 'asc' THEN duration END ASC,
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'duration' AND sort.direction = 'desc' THEN duration END DESC,
-- date, then title
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'date_added' AND sort.direction = 'asc' THEN dateAdded END DESC,
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'date_added' AND sort.direction = 'desc' THEN dateAdded END ASC,
-- default, and second sort
CASE WHEN sort.direction = 'asc' THEN lower(title) COLLATE UNICODE END ASC,
CASE WHEN sort.direction = 'desc' THEN lower(title) COLLATE UNICODE END DESC

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT DISTINCT artistId AS id, artist AS name, count(*) AS songs, MIN(dateAdded) as dateAdded 
FROM songs_view
GROUP BY artistId
ORDER BY lower(name) COLLATE UNICODE ASC

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT DISTINCT albumId AS id, artistId, album AS title, artist, albumArtist, count(*) AS songs, MIN(dateAdded) as dateAdded, directory
FROM songs_view
GROUP BY albumId
ORDER BY lower(album) COLLATE UNICODE ASC

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT artists_view.*
FROM artists_view LEFT JOIN sort ON TRUE
WHERE sort.tableName = 'artists'
ORDER BY
-- artist
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'artist' AND name = '<unknown>' THEN -1 END,
-- date, then artist
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'date_added' AND sort.direction = 'asc' THEN dateAdded END ASC,
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'date_added' AND sort.direction = 'desc' THEN dateAdded END DESC,
-- default, and second sort
CASE WHEN sort.direction = 'asc' THEN lower(name) END COLLATE UNICODE ASC,
CASE WHEN sort.direction = 'desc' THEN lower(name) END COLLATE UNICODE DESC

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT albums_view.*
FROM albums_view LEFT JOIN sort ON TRUE
WHERE sort.tableName = 'albums'
ORDER BY
-- title, then artist
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'album' AND title = '<unknown>' THEN -1 END,
-- artist, then artist
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'artist' AND artist = '<unknown>' THEN -1 END,
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'artist' AND sort.direction = 'asc' THEN lower(artist) END COLLATE UNICODE ASC,
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'artist' AND sort.direction = 'desc' THEN lower(artist) END COLLATE UNICODE DESC,
-- date, then artist
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'date_added' AND sort.direction = 'asc' THEN dateAdded END ASC,
CASE WHEN sort.columnName = 'date_added' AND sort.direction = 'desc' THEN dateAdded END DESC,
-- default, and second sort
CASE WHEN sort.direction = 'asc' THEN lower(title) END COLLATE UNICODE ASC,
CASE WHEN sort.direction = 'desc' THEN lower(title) END COLLATE UNICODE DESC
